name: Keystone
description: Keystone module used primarily for patch panels

name: SFP
description: Small Formfactor Pluggable according to SFF Commttee specification INF-8074i

description: Enhanced Small Formfactor Pluggable according to SFF Commttee specification SFF-8431

name: Expansion I/O
